data.title: Literacy and Hindu Muslim Population
data.text:
Gulbarga Population 2024

Gulbarga city is governed by Municipal Corporation which comes under Gulbarga Metropolitan Region. The Gulbarga city is located in Karnataka state of India.

The current estimate population of Gulbarga city in 2024 is 756,000 , while Gulbarga metro population is estimated at 770,000 . The last census was conducted in 2011 and the schedule census for Gulbarga city in 2021 was postponed due to Covid. The current estimates of Gulbarga city are based on past growth rate. Once govt conducts census for Gulbarga city, we will update the same here in 2024. As per provisional reports of Census India, population of Gulbarga in 2011 is 533,587. Although Gulbarga city has population of 533,587; its urban / metropolitan population is 543,147.

Gulbarga Literacy Rate and Sex Ratio

In education section, total literates in Gulbarga city are 382,775 of which 207,498 are males while 175,277 are females. Average literacy rate of Gulbarga city is 82.30 percent of which male and female literacy was 87.87 and 76.57 percent. The sex ratio of Gulbarga city is 964 per 1000 males. Child sex ratio of girls is 930 per 1000 boys.

Gulbarga Slum Population

Total no. of Slums in Gulbarga city & its Out Growth numbers 8,385 in which population of 44,867 resides. This is around 8.26% of total population of Gulbarga city & its outgrowth which is 543,147.

Gulbarga Religion

Hinduism is majority religion in Gulbarga city with 59.62 % followers. Islam is second most popular religion in city of Gulbarga with approximately 37.29 % following it. In Gulbarga city, Christinity is followed by 0.52 %, Jainism by 0.40 %, Sikhism by 0.06 % and Buddhism by 0.22 %. Around 0.01 % stated 'Other Religion', approximately 1.88 % stated 'No Particular Religion'.

Gulbarga Future Population 2021-2031

Gulbarga Metropolitan Region

Gulbarga city comes under Gulbarga Metropolitan area.
